Class wallObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • wallObstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class wallObstacle
extends java.lang.Thread
    Author:
    Ege Ozer wall obstacle class that has its own dedicated Thread. This class constantly scans for any object closer than 20cm with the ultrasonic sesnsor. Once an object is detected, it goes to either left/right, goes a tile distance, then turns 90 degrees and goes the distance of two tiles. The angle at which it turns depends on the robots location(left, right or down lane going up, down, left or right)
